mapper.sql: id as id, agentno as agentno, agent_name as agentName, full_name as fullName, divide as divide, legal_name as legalName, identity_card as identityCard, link_man as linkMan, email as email, telephone as telephone, mobile as mobile, member_fee as memberFee, assurance_fee as assuranceFee, area_code as areaCode, address as address, super_agent as superAgent, status as status, open_time as openTime, audit_status as auditStatus, audit_agentno as auditAgentno, accountno as accountno, account_type as accountType, account_name as accountName, bankno as bankno, bank_name as bankName, identity_card_img as identityCardImg, contract_img as contractImg, other_file as otherFile, add_time as addTime, agent_level as agentLevel, agent_type as agentType, branchno as branchno, agentno_first as agentnoFirst, biz_type as bizType, bank_card_img as bankCardImg, withdrawal_fee as withdrawalFee, t0_divide as t0Divide, pos_debit_rate as posDebitRate, pos_debit_fixed as posDebitFixed, pos_credit_rate as posCreditRate, app_debit_rate as appDebitRate, app_debit_fixed as appDebitFixed, app_credit_rate as appCreditRate, pos_t0_rate as posT0Rate, app_t0_rate as appT0Rate, online_rate as onlineRate, fastpay_rate_t0 as fastPayRateT0, fastpay_rate_t1 as fastPayRateT1, gateway_rate_t0 as gatewayRateT0
mapper.select:
select max(agentno) from
where agentno like concat(substr(#{agentno}, 0,4), '%')

select ai.id as id, ai.agentno as agentno, ai.agent_name as agentName, ai.full_name as fullName, ai.divide as divide, ai.legal_name as legalName, ai.identity_card as identityCard, ai.link_man as linkMan, ai.email as email, ai.telephone as telephone, ai.mobile as mobile, ai.member_fee as memberFee, ai.assurance_fee as assuranceFee, ai.area_code as areaCode, ai.address as address, ai.super_agent as superAgent, ai.status as status, ai.open_time as openTime, ai.audit_status as auditStatus, ai.audit_agentno as auditAgentno, ai.accountno as accountno, ai.account_type as accountType, ai.account_name as accountName, ai.bankno as bankno, ai.bank_name as bankName, ai.identity_card_img as identityCardImg, ai.contract_img as contractImg, ai.other_file as otherFile, ai.add_time as addTime, ai.agent_level as agentLevel, ai.agent_type as agentType, ai.branchno as branchno, ai.agentno_first as agentnoFirst, ai.biz_type as bizType, ai.bank_card_img as bankCardImg, ai.withdrawal_fee as withdrawalFee, ai.t0_divide as t0Divide, ai.pos_debit_rate as posDebitRate, ai.pos_debit_fixed as posDebitFixed, ai.pos_credit_rate as posCreditRate, ai.app_debit_rate as appDebitRate, ai.app_debit_fixed as appDebitFixed, ai.app_credit_rate as appCreditRate, ai.pos_t0_rate as posT0Rate, ai.app_t0_rate as appT0Rate, ai.online_rate as onlineRate, ai.fastpay_rate_t0 as fastPayRateT0, ai.fastpay_rate_t1 as fastPayRateT1, ai.gateway_rate_t0 as gatewayRateT0 from agent_info ai left join merch_info mi on ai.mobile=mi.mobile where mi.id=#{id}
